pr_title: Show raids loot value at the end of the raid

timeline.bodyText: Check widget id first, it is cheaper.
timeline.author: Adam-
Adam-
Adam-

replies.bodyText: Guess it is not needed, was thinking about it not checking item price if it is an untradable item but the item prive would be 0 anyways so it is useless, will take it out
replies.author: melkypie

replies.bodyText: The item manager has some logic to apply prices to untradeables, but if you don't want it to there is a ignoreUntradeableMap flag.
replies.author: Adam-

timeline.bodyText: This should maybe be a long.
timeline.author: Adam-

replies.bodyText: QuantityFormatter.quantitotyToRsDecimalStack requires an int, that is why I left it as int
replies.author: melkypie

timeline.message:
raids plugin: add option to show loot value
